banner.title: Simple solution for
banner.heading: Simplified Invoice
banner.sub_heading: Point of sale in any device.

features.heading: Easiest POS software to use
features.sub_heading: with all features you need to grow your business

features1.heading: POS on any Device
features1.sub_heading: anyPOS software works on any mobile, tab or PC. Get full POS without spending thousands on clunky hardware and legacy software’s.

features2.heading: ZATCA e-Invoicing
features2.sub_heading: Print simplified invoices in compliance with ZATCA standards

features3.heading: It’s on Cloud!
features3.sub_heading: As anyPOS is on cloud so you can access it anytime from anywhere in the word its available 24/7. See the live progress of your store sales through our integrated dashboard. We store your important business data securely in the cloud to protect your business against events like computer theft, viruses, and unexpected breakdowns.

features4.heading: Online & Offline
features4.sub_heading: anyPOS is a cloud-based platform that can also work offline. All offline transactions are automatically synced with your store’s cloud once you get back online. So, continue selling, even when there’s no internet.

features5.heading: Accept Payments
features5.sub_heading: With anyPOS you can accept payment quickly and easily. We are integrated with all major payment gateways of Saudi Arabia.

features6.heading: High Level Reports
features6.sub_heading: anyPOS central dashboard gives you an ability to review sales, customer, and overall business performances. Make better decisions with anyPOS cloud-based POS.

billing.heading: Simple Billing Plan's
list: Import/edit products by a CSV file
